summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6466 for the improvement of HARBOR AVENUE SOUTHWEST from Southwest Florida Street to approximately 975 feet northwesterly thereof; and a certain other avenue; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 99427, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund and amending Section 4 of Ordinance No. 99427.
